tool_description: Checks availability of meeting equipment and technology resources for specified time periods and locations.

equipment_types.description: List of equipment types needed (projector, whiteboard, video_conference, audio_system, laptop, tablet)

location.description: Building or office location where equipment is needed

start_time.description: Equipment needed from time in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: Equipment needed until time in ISO 8601 format

quantity_needed.description: Quantity needed for each equipment type (matches equipment_types order)

error_messages: Invalid equipment types: One or more equipment types not recognized.
Invalid location: Location identifier not found in system.
Invalid time range: start_time must be before end_time and in valid ISO 8601 format.
Quantity mismatch: quantity_needed array must match equipment_types array length.
Equipment not available at location: Requested equipment not available at specified location.
usage: Specify equipment types, location, and time range. Optional quantity specification for each equipment type. Returns availability status and reservation options.

available_equipment.description: List of available equipment with identifiers

unavailable_equipment.description: List of equipment types that are not available
